Text: X5 version crashes during rendering too.  Open a browser page to cover the program and it won't crash.  It's a graphics driver problem,  probably AMD.  Great upload,  btw
Excellent! Quick & easy install on Windows 7 Ultimate (Brazilian Portuguese). Great job! Thank you!

Fixed the crashing.  If anyone gets this program,  here's how to fix it from crashing.  Google for a file called atimpenc.dll,  download it and copy it into both system32 and sysWOW64 folders inside your C:Windows folder.  Fixed mine and the program works flawlessly.

Works like a Charm!

Indeed, scene4all is trusty as a trombone.
Heartfelt greetings and thanks to X-FORCE and scene4all all the way from the East!
Does it have the issue X5 had where the PSI_SVC_2 service had to be running all the time, and you had to write a batch file to get around it ?
